gene.function: FUNCTION: One of the multiple factors required for polyadenylation and 3'-end cleavage of mammalian pre-mRNAs. This subunit is directly involved in the binding to pre-mRNAs (By similarity). {ECO:0000250, ECO:0000269|PubMed:9199325}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Nucleus {ECO:0000269|PubMed:11598190}. Note=Localized with DDX1 in cleavage bodies.
geneOntologyCellularComponent: mRNA cleavage and polyadenylation specificity factor complex [GO:0005847]
geneOntologyBiologicalProcess: termination of RNA polymerase II transcription [GO:0006369]
tRNA splicing, via endonucleolytic cleavage and ligation [GO:0006388]
